attributes.additional_details:
This petition is
1- against the proposed changes to the pension age proposed in the chancellors autumn statement 2013.
2- That we have the right to know our pensionable age and that it should never be subject to change.
3- Any future change(to those as yet unborn.) should be based on meaningful years not life expectancy i.e. we are not to old to have a little enjoyment out of harness.
